manipulations.insert_object: Insert a large, ornate chandelier hanging from the ceiling, casting soft shadows on the attendees.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the water pitcher from the table in front of the man in the suit, ensuring the tablecloth appears seamless.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the background with a bustling city street scene visible through large windows, matching the perspective and lighting.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Add heavy rain streaks to the windows in the background, with corresponding reflections and diffused lighting.
manipulations.duplication_scale: Duplicate the flag pin on the man in uniform and enlarge it significantly, casting a shadow.
